Package etc.aloe.processes

Interface Summary
Balancing Procedure for balancing a set of segments according to some algorithm.
FeatureExtraction FeatureExtraction extracts features from the provided data.
FeatureGeneration FeatureGeneration creates a feature specification from a set of messages.
FeatureWeighting Process for extracting feature weight information.
LabelMapping LabelMapping maps predicted labels onto un-classified messages, producing labeled messages.
Loading An object that can be loaded from a file.
Loggable Indicates a class that has configurable verbosity levels.
Saving An object that can be saved to a file.
Segmentation Segments a set of messages.
SegmentResolution Resolution resolves disagreement among labels applied to the messages within a segment.
Training Training creates a trained model from labeled examples.
 

Class Summary
CrossValidationPrep<T extends LabelableItem> CrossValidationPrep prepares a set of labeled entities for cross validation.
CrossValidationSplit<T extends LabelableItem> Procedure for separating data items into training and test sets for cross validation.
 

Enum Summary
Loggable.Verbosity
